summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1552, for the improvement of Union Street, from Eighth Avenue to the east line of Hubbell Place; and Ninth Avenue, from Union Street to Pine Street, by paving the same with vitrified brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation, together with granite curbs, and such extensions to the existing water mains and sewer system as may be necessary, under Ordinance No. 16711 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
